ja521:9.1: tapokammaṃ → tape kammaṃ (bj, s2, s3, pts1)
ja521:11.1: tāta alakkhī ca → sirī ca tāta lakkhī ca (s2, s3, pts1)
ja521:13.1: tvaṃ sabbesu suhadayo → so tvaṃ sabbesaṃ suhadayo (s2, s3, pts1) | so tvaṃ sabbe suhadayo (mr)
ja521:16.3: Uṭṭhāhato → uṭṭhahato (bj, s2, s3, pts1), appamajjato → mappamajjato (mr)
ja521:19.1: Sakkhisi tvaṃ → sakkhī tuvaṃ (bj, pts1) | sakkhi tuvaṃ (s2, s3)
ja521:30.5: Sīlavāssu → sīlavassu (bj, s2, s3, pts1) | sīlavāssa (ṭīkā)
ja521:31.1: Apucchimha kosiyagottaṃ → apucchimhā kosiyagottaṃ (s2, s3) | apucchamhāpi kosikaṃ (pts1)
ja521:31.3: Tvaṃ dāni vadehi jambuka → jambuka tvaṃdāni vadehi (s2, s3, pts1)
ja521:38.1: Paññāva sutaṃ vinicchinī → paññā sutavinicchinī (s2, s3, pts1)
ja521:40.4: kammaphalaṃ tassijjhati → tamphalaṃ tassa ijjhati (bj) | kammaphalaṃ tassa ijjhati (s2, s3, pts1, c1) | phalaṃ tassa samijjhati (mr)
ja521:52.2: dhammo ciṇṇo sukhāvaho → dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahati (mr)
